description: Take a peaceful 90-minute paddleboarding session on Aasee lake. Enjoy the serene water and beautiful surroundings.

locationInfo.description: Aasee is a popular spot for water sports. Paddleboarding here offers a calm experience surrounded by nature.
safetyTips: Ensure you have balance before starting to paddle.

description: Explore Münster's iconic Promenade, cycling around the city center for about 90 minutes while enjoying the urban landscape and parks.

locationInfo.description: The Promenade encircles Münster's city center, offering a smooth ride with beautiful views of parks and historical landmarks.
safetyTips: Check your bike's brakes before riding.

description: Take a relaxing stroll through the gardens of Münster Castle, enjoying the beautiful landscaping and peaceful ambiance for 90 minutes.

locationInfo.description: The gardens at Münster Castle are perfect for a tranquil walk surrounded by lush greenery and historical architecture.
safetyTips: Watch for slippery areas when it's wet.

description: Practice yoga outdoors at Bürgerpark for 90 minutes, enjoying the calm environment and fresh air under the sunny skies.

locationInfo.description: Bürgerpark offers plenty of green space for yoga. The peaceful setting helps you focus and connect with nature.
safetyTips: Bring your own mat for comfort.
Hydrate well before and after your session.

activity: Walking Tour of the City Centre
description: Take a guided 90-minute walking tour around the Münster city center, exploring historical landmarks and vibrant local spots.

locationInfo.description: Münster’s city center is home to picturesque squares, medieval streets, and historical buildings. Perfect for discovering the city's past and culture.
safetyTips: Stay hydrated, especially on warmer days.
